name: shell-trap
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the user was not yet hit by an opponent's physical move this turn, this move will fail.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a
physical move, the trap will explode and inflict
damage on the opposing Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user sets a shell trap. If the user is hit by a
physical move, the trap will explode and inflict
damage on the opposing Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:

physical move, the trap will explode and inflict
damage on the opposing Pokémon.
